name: Bissell Pet Hair Eraser Upright Vacuum Cleaner
description: At BISSELL, we know pets can make a mess at any moment – that’s why we created the Pet Hair Eraser™ Turbo Vacuum. Powerful pet hair pickup in a lightweight and agile design.
longdescription: At BISSELL, we know pets can make a mess at any moment – that’s why we created the Pet Hair Eraser™ Turbo Vacuum. Powerful pet hair pickup in a lightweight and agile design.  The Pet Hair Eraser® Turbo Vacuum Cleaner comes with powerful pickup packed into a lightweight and agile machine for easy and convenient everyday cleanup.  Enjoy the Quick Release Extension Wand which is always on and always ready to tackle those tricky, hard-to-reach pet messes around the home.  Plus, with features like the Tangle-Free Brush Roll and a Hands-Free Empty Dirt Tank, you don’t have to worry about cleaning your vacuum after you’ve cleaned your home.  You can also breathe easy with the Smart Seal® Allergen System that traps dirt and allergens and eliminates odors so you can enjoy a fresher, cleaner home.

name: Bissell Big Green Carpet Cleaner
description: Professional level carpet cleaning any time you need it. Get professional-grade carpet cleaning any time you want with the BISSELL Big Green® Deep Cleaning Machine.

name: Bissell Steam Mop PowerFresh V
description: Naturally clean and sanitise! The BISSELL PowerFresh V Steam Mop is a hard surface steam cleaner that uses the natural power of steam to easily clean and sanitise your floors. Kills 99.9% of germs, bacteria and viruses* when used as directed

name: Bosch Series 6 Bagged vacuum cleaner ProAnimal Red
description: Bosch Series 6 ProAnimal Vacuum. With powerful 300-850W suction, specialised pet hair pickup and a hygienic bagged system, this vacuum is perfect for homes with pets.

name: Bosch Series 6 Bagged vacuum cleaner ProHygienic White
description: The Bosch Series 6 ProHygienic Vacuum offers powerful suction, sealed allergen filtration & easy handling. Perfect for keeping your home dust and allergen-free.
